messages.subject: Re: Glad to be back!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Mary! We just moved about 10 minutes up the road although you think that would make it easier!!  We are in East Boca now which seems to make all the
messages.messageBody:
Hi Mary!

We just moved about 10 minutes up the road although you think that
would make it easier!! We are in East Boca now which seems to make
all the activities even further from HELPS. We went to the picnic
yesterday which turned out to be great because there were a bunch of
boys all around 4-5 so Keiran has a blast and Pierce just thinks he
is one of the big kids so he loved it!

Olga :)

--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "Mary" <mummy124@b...>

Hey Olga,

I wondered what happened to you. Glad everything settles okay. Are you still
in the same area? Welcome back.

Mary B.

messages.subject: Glad to be back!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, Life got very crazy for us recently and I could not even keep up with reading the emails, more or less posting so we dissapeared for a while.  We
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

Life got very crazy for us recently and I could not even keep up
with reading the emails, more or less posting so we dissapeared for
a while. We just moved and that along with work and family life has
kept this summer busy and even forced us to miss the conference :(
(which I am still bummed about!) Life is seeming to settle and I am
missing all the great information and advice so I can't wait to get
reading. With everyone arounf us back in school, all those
anxieties are creeping in!!! I am looking forward to much more
great wisdom and parenting help!!!

Olga :)
